about_the_game:
"Beyond the Curtains" is a tranquil and relaxing game of casually gazing out the window, longing to witness interesting events and surprises.
Through the large window, you will have the opportunity to experience the world outside from the perspective of the room's owner.
Before long, even the fleeting shadows left by passers-by will become a glimpse into their evolving, ever-changing lives.
Additionally, the interior of the room will change over time, which may reveal some personal information about the one viewing through the window...?

Features

As you continually cycle between day and night, time actually keeps moving forward. And the things outside the window will change accordingly...






● Pick-me-up for hard times: Maybe your classroom or office doesn't have a window, but it does now, and it's always sunny!
● Progress at your own pace: Use the nap button to change the time of day so you don't have to worry about missing anything.
● Selectable topics: longing and fantasy, sex and curiosity, different windows, different people's rooms.
● Adjust the music to your taste: Use the in-room playback device to choose from original, classical, or even... heavy metal?
● Become one with the window: Minimal buttons and UI for maximum immersion.
